No the host does not speak english. But the written instructions on the screen are in english. And my kids don't seem to mind the host speaking in tounges. I can report this works after converting to an ISO and burning with ImgBurn and running on a softmod Wii with Neogamma  R7 IOS 249 (Rev 14)

If your Wii is NTSC (North American) and you have downloaded this rom, make sure you have the setting "Force NTSC" or it's equivalent on with whatever usb loader you are using. If the game is still in black & white, just search for the NTSC version of the game
